channel.title: Offering Help To People Who Need It :)
channel.description: If anyone needs Help urgently i will come on teamviewer or something to help you as fast as i can, just add me on skype if you need a question answering :) Skype: ExotiicDeath

item.title: Offering Help To People Who Need It :)
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

This section as a whole is designed for help. If you post a topic like this, it therefore defeats the purpose of this section. While we’re grateful you’re offering help, please do so in the individuals threads who are asking for help. Cheers.

Read full topic
item.source: Offering Help To People Who Need It :)

item.title: Offering Help To People Who Need It :)
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

marcbob:

You help those who need it when they post. You are really not supposed to make a topic like this.

Read full topic
item.source: Offering Help To People Who Need It :)

item.title: Offering Help To People Who Need It :)
item.dc:creator: @Bellend Bellend
item.description:
@Bellend wrote:

Yep, the reason im not helpful to people like you is because you dont use your brain… lets think about this for a second, if your worried about me giving you the source, why not go fucking Google it your self you lazy bastard… its people like you who dont deserve help…

Read full topic
item.source: Offering Help To People Who Need It :)

item.title: Offering Help To People Who Need It :)
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Bellend:

Yeah i could… i said go get the Xyle base its clean and stable but your too stuck up…

No, you said you’d upload the Xyle base which I do not want as I’ve not seen media and your upload could be riddled with viruses.
Awh geez, why so mean:(? Constant insults because you can’t communicate like a normal person by the looks of it:. Anyways, argument over.

You weren’t helpful, just so everyone knows;3.

Read full topic

item.title: Offering Help To People Who Need It :)
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Bellend:

But this offers more help because its instant, and whats wrong with it? i didnt think people would complain at free help …

The idea is a person posts a problem they have and then you help them. Look through the help section and you can offer help to any problem you think you can fix or solve.

Read full topic
